questions.question: What places do you want to visit today?
Do you mind drinking alcohol today?
What is your favourite movie genre?
Why did you decide to do an exchange semester?
options: To get away from where I normally live
To get some more academic experience

questions.question: Which one of those places in Munich have you already visited? (if you've seen more than one of the options, pick the one you like most)
options: Any restaurant with typical German cuisine

questions.question: Who did you hang out with in Munich up till now?
options: Friends who came here with me
No one in particular, people I have met here and there
